00001 #include "TransformParser.h"
00002 #include "TransformCommand.h"
00003 #include "RotateTransformCommand.h"
00004 #include "ScaleTransformCommand.h"
00005 #include "TranslateTransformCommand.h"
00006 #include "MatrixTransformCommand.h"
00007 #include "SkewXTransformCommand.h"
00008 #include "SkewYTransformCommand.h"

00010 #include <vector>
00011 #include <sstream>
00012 using namespace std;
00013 using namespace jvgs::math;
00014 
00015 #include "../core/LogManager.h"
00016 using namespace jvgs::core;
00017 
00018 namespace jvgs
00019 {
00020     namespace sketch
00021     {
00022         TransformParser::TransformParser()
00023         {
00024             commands["rotate"] = new RotateTransformCommand();
00025             commands["scale"] = new ScaleTransformCommand();
00026             commands["translate"] = new TranslateTransformCommand();
00027             commands["matrix"] = new MatrixTransformCommand();
00028             commands["skewX"] = new SkewXTransformCommand();
00029             commands["skewY"] = new SkewYTransformCommand();
00030         }
00031 
00032         TransformParser::~TransformParser()
00033         {
00034             for(map<string, TransformCommand*>::iterator iterator =
00035                     commands.begin(); iterator != commands.end(); iterator++) {
00036                 delete iterator->second;
00037             }
00038         }
00039 
00040         AffineTransformationMatrix TransformParser::parse(const string &data)
00041         {
00042             AffineTransformationMatrix matrix;
00043 
00044             string::size_type position = 0;
00045             while(position < data.size() && position != string::npos) {
00046                 string::size_type opening = data.find_first_of('(', position);
00047                 string command = data.substr(position, opening - position);
00048                 command = trim(command);
00049                 position = data.find_first_of(')', opening);
00050 
00051                 string argumentString = data.substr(opening + 1,
00052                         position - opening - 1);
00053                 vector<string> arguments;
00054                 split(argumentString, ", ", arguments);
00055 
00056                 vector<float> floatArguments;
00057 
00058                 for(vector<string>::iterator iterator = arguments.begin(); 
00059                         iterator != arguments.end(); iterator++ )
00060                 {
00061                     float f;
00062                     stringstream converter(*iterator);
00063                     converter >> f;
00064                     floatArguments.push_back(f);
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 map<string, TransformCommand*>::iterator iterator =
00068                         commands.find(command);
00069 
00070                 if(iterator != commands.end()) {
00071                     iterator->second->apply(matrix, floatArguments);
00072                 } else {
00073                     LogManager::getInstance()->warning(
00074                             "Unknown tranform command \"%s\"", command.c_str());
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 position++;
00078             }
00079 
00080             return matrix;
00081         }
00082     }
00083 }
